mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT m.id, m.NAME , m.EMAIL , m.PNUM , m.USERZIPCODE , m.CARDCHECK , m.LIKESTORE1 , m.LIKESTORE2 , m.LIKESTORE3 , m.USERFIRSTADDR , m.USERSECONDADDR , USEREXTRAADDR , p.CARDCOM , p.CARDCVC , p.CARDEXP ,p.CARDNUM , b.BUBBLE FROM MEMBERS m ,PERSONALPAY p,BUBBLE b WHERE m.id=p.ID(+) AND m.id=b.ID(+) AND m.id=#{id} ORDER BY rownum DESC) WHERE rownum=1

UPDATE PERSONALPAY SET CARDCOM=#{cardCom}, CARDNUM=#{cardNum}, CARDEXP=#{cardExp}, CARDCVC=#{cardCvc} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PERSONALPAY (ID, CARDCOM, CARDNUM, CARDEXP, CARDCVC) VALUES(#{id},#{cardCom} ,#{cardNum},#{cardExp}, #{cardCvc})
